alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Issaquena; Madison; Sharkey; Washington; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 1:31PM CDT until May 11 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Yazoo County in central Mississippi... North central Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... Central Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 130 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kilbourne to near Satartia, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Yazoo City, Rolling Fork, Anguilla, Benton, Glen Allan, Louise, Panther Burn, Grace, Delta City, Satartia, Nitta Yuma, Way, Myrleville, Holly Bluff, Tinsley, Midnight and Little Yazoo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern and west central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Humphreys; Issaquena; Madison; Sharkey; Washington; Yazoo
